TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetManagementUtility extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IAspNetManagementUtility
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetManagementUtility Implements IAspNetManagementUtility

summary.span: 提供 Helper 方法，這些方法由 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 的 ASP.NET 嵌入式管理單元使用。

span.span: Provides helper methods that are used by the ASP.NET snap-in for the Microsoft Management Console (MMC).
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用 AspNetManagementUtility 類別和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the AspNetManagementUtility class and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public AspNetManagementUtility ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: AspNetManagementUtility();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AcquireVersionList (out string versionList, int versionFirst);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AcquireVersionList([out] string& versionList, int32 versionFirst) cil managed
Public Sub AcquireVersionList (ByRef versionList As String, versionFirst As Integer)
public: virtual void AcquireVersionList([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % versionList, int versionFirst);
abstract member AcquireVersionList : * int -> unit override this.AcquireVersionList : * int -> unit

param.name: versionList
param.span: 逗點分隔清單，包含每個已安裝 ASP.NET 版本的 Aspnet_isapi.dll 版本及路徑。

span.span: A comma-separated list containing the version and path to the Aspnet_isapi.dll for each installed ASP.NET version.

param.name: versionFirst
param.span: 在每個項目的路徑之前顯示 ASP.NET 版本則為 0，否則在每個項目的 ASP.NET 版本之前顯示路徑。

span.span: A 0 to display the ASP.NET version before the path for each entry; otherwise, display the path before the ASP.NET version for each entry.

summary.span: 傳回逗點分隔清單，包含每個已安裝 ASP.NET 版本的 Aspnet_isapi.dll 版本及路徑。

span.span: Returns a comma-separated list containing the version and path to the Aspnet_isapi.dll for each installed ASP.NET version.

param.name: keyPath

span.span: The virtual path to which to register the Aspnet_isapi.dll specified by the path passed in .

param.name: dllInstall

param.name: flags

summary.span: 將 參數所指定的 Aspnet_isapi.dll 版本，註冊至 參數所指定的 Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 虛擬路徑。

span.span: Registers the version of Aspnet_isapi.dll that is specified by the parameter to the Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual path that is specified by the parameter.

public: virtual void DisplayAspNetConfigSettings(System::String ^ machineName, System::String ^ site, System::String ^ virtualDirectory, System::String ^ siteName, System::String ^ location, int processID, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % exception);

abstract member DisplayAspNetConfigSettings : string * string * string * string * string * int * -> unit override this.DisplayAspNetConfigSettings : string * string * string * string * string * int * -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: aspNetManagementUtility.DisplayAspNetConfigSettings (machineName, site, virtualDirectory, siteName, location, processID, exception)

param.name: machineName
param.span: 要擷取組態設定的來源電腦。

span.span: The computer to retrieve configuration settings from.

param.name: site
param.span: 要擷取組態設定來源的 IIS 網站識別碼。

span.span: The ID of the IIS website to retrieve configuration settings from.

param.name: virtualDirectory
param.span: 要擷取組態設定的來源 IIS 虛擬目錄。

span.span: The IIS virtual directory to retrieve configuration settings from.

param.name: siteName
param.span: 要擷取組態設定的來源 IIS 網站名稱。

span.span: The name of the IIS site to retrieve configuration settings from.

param.name: location
param.span: 套用此組態的特定資源。

span.span: The specific resource to which the configuration applies.

param.name: processID
param.span: 顯示組態設定對話方塊之處理序的系統處理序 ID。

span.span: The system process ID of the process displaying the configuration settings dialog box.

param.name: exception
param.span: 發生的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception(s) that occurred.

summary.span: 擷取指定 ASP.NET Web 應用程式的 ASP.NET 組態設定。

span.span: Retrieves the ASP.NET configuration settings for the specified ASP.NET web application.

Public Shared Function GetActiveWindow () As IntPtr

static member GetActiveWindow : unit -> nativeint

summary.span: 擷取現用視窗的視窗控制代碼 (Window Handle)，該視窗附加至呼叫執行緒的訊息佇列。

span.span: Retrieves the window handle to the active window that is attached to the message queue of the calling thread.

returns.span: 附加至呼叫執行緒訊息佇列的使用中視窗控制代碼；否則為 Null (Visual Basic 中為 Nothing)。

span.span: The handle to the active window attached to the message queue of the calling thread; otherwise, null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

public: virtual void IsRemoteConfigured([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % isRemoteConfigured);
abstract member IsRemoteConfigured : -> unit override this.IsRemoteConfigured : -> unit

param.name: isRemoteConfigured
param.span: 如果 ASP.NET 組態容器的遠端存取已啟用則為 1，否則為 0。

span.span: A 1 if remote access to the ASP.NET configuration container is enabled; otherwise, 0.

summary.span: 傳回值，指出是否啟用 ASP.NET 組態容器 (Container) 的遠端存取。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether remote access to the ASP.NET configuration container is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計類別和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the class and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public static int MessageBox (IntPtr hWnd, string text, string caption, int type);
.method public static hidebysig pinvokeimpl ("user32.dll" as "MessageBox" auto winapi)int32 MessageBox(native int hWnd, string text, string caption, int32 type) cil managed
Public Shared Function MessageBox (hWnd As IntPtr, text As String, caption As String, type As Integer) As Integer
public: static int MessageBox(IntPtr hWnd, System::String ^ text, System::String ^ caption, int type);
static member MessageBox : nativeint * string * string * int -> int

param.name: hWnd
param.span: 要建立之訊息方塊的擁有人控制代碼。

span.span: A handle to the owner of the message box to create.

param.span: 若 hWnd 為 Null (Visual Basic 中的 Nothing)，則訊息方塊便沒有主控視窗。

span.span: If hWnd is null (Nothing in Visual Basic), the message box has no owner window.

param.name: text
param.span: 要顯示之訊息方塊的訊息。

span.span: The message for the message box to display.

param.name: caption
param.span: 訊息方塊標題。

span.span: The message box title.

param.name: type
param.span: 訊息方塊的內容和行為。

span.span: The contents and behavior of the message box.

summary.span: 在 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 的 ASP.NET 嵌入式管理單元中建立、顯示和操作訊息方塊。

span.span: Creates, displays, and operates a message box in the ASP.NET snap-in for the Microsoft Management Console (MMC).

Docs.returns:
當訊息方塊具有 [取消] 按鈕，且按下 ESC 鍵或按一下 [取消] 時，則為 IDCANCEL。IDCANCEL, if the message box has a **Cancel** button and either ESC is pressed or **Cancel** is clicked. 若訊息沒有 [取消] 按鈕，則按下 ESC 鍵沒有作用。If the message has no **Cancel** button, pressing ESC has no effect. 如果函式失敗，則會傳回 0。If the function fails, 0. 如果函式成功，則傳回值是下列其中一個功能表項目值：If the function succeeds, the return value is one of the following menu-item values:
| 傳回值 | 描述 | | --- | --- | | IDABORT | 已按下 [中止]。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | IDABORT | **Abort** was clicked. | | IDCANCEL | 已按下 [取消]。| | IDCANCEL | **Cancel** was clicked. | | IDCONTINUE | 已按下 [繼續]。| | IDCONTINUE | **Continue** was clicked. | | IDIGNORE | 已按下 [忽略]。| | IDIGNORE | **Ignore** was clicked. | | IDNO | 已按下 [否]。| | IDNO | **No** was clicked. | | IDOK | 已按下 [確定]。| | IDOK | **OK** was clicked. | | IDRETRY | 已按下 [重試]。| | IDRETRY | **Retry** was clicked. | | IDTRYAGAIN | 已按下 [再試一次]。| | IDTRYAGAIN | **Try Again** was clicked. | | IDYES | 已按下 [是]。| | IDYES | **Yes** was clicked. |

param.name: filename

Public Sub ReadFileDates (filename As String, ByRef creationDate As String, ByRef modifiedDate As String, ByRef lastAccessDate As String)

abstract member ReadFileDates : string * * * -> unit override this.ReadFileDates : string * * * -> unit

param.name: filename
param.span: 要從中讀取日期的檔案名稱。

param.name: creationDate

param.name: modifiedDate

param.name: lastAccessDate

span.span: The date and time the file was last accessed.

summary.span: 傳回指定檔案名稱的建立、修改和上次存取日期與時間。

span.span: Returns the creation, modified, and last access dates and times for the specified filename.

param.name: doReg
param.span: 若要註冊型別則為 1，若要移除註冊型別則為 0。

param.name: typeName
param.span: 要註冊的型別名稱

span.span: The name of the type to register

param.name: binaryDirectory

param.name: exception

span.span: A pointer to any exception thrown during registration.

summary.span: 向 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 註冊 ASP.NET 嵌入式管理單元。
